about_the_game:
QQ Group: 1143247188

Discord:

🍓🍋🍇《Fruit: Chain Effect》🍇🍋🍓


Welcome to 《Fruit: Chain Effect》—a fun-filled puzzle game bursting with fruit and excitement! Embark on an extraordinary match-3 journey in a world brimming with vibrant colors and delicious fruits.

🍎Game Features🍎

🍌Good Economy:
All fruit types are dropped in limited quantities, preventing market crashes and ensuring each fruit is used to its fullest.

🍓Diverse Fruit Backgrounds:
Explore a variety of fruit scenes, with each level offering a different visual delight.

🍋Innovative Connect Gameplay:
New elements added to classic connect gameplay, allowing you to experience the charm of complex strategies within simple rules.

🍊Exquisite Sound Effects and Background Music:
Enjoy pleasing sound effects and relaxing background music for a comprehensive gaming experience.

🍇Item Drop System:
Now, you can earn rare fruits randomly while playing the game online. Each time you play, you have a chance to collect up to 120 types of fruit skins, including legendary, premium, rare, advanced, and common varieties.
*120 types of fruits and premiums will be gradually released with updates.

🍒Market Drop Trading Support:
These rare fruits can be traded through the market drop trading system, adding more fun and community interaction to your gameplay.

🍉Game Leaderboards and Rewards:
Challenge the leaderboards and win generous rewards for ranking high! Showcase your match-3 skills and earn glory and valuable rewards.

🎵Original Soundtrack Music:
Enjoy up to 12 original soundtrack songs, listening to heavenly tunes that add more fun and atmosphere to the game.

Are you ready? Come and experience the endless fun of fruit elimination in the world of 《Fruit: Chain Effect》!

name: Fruit: Chain Effect

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Dual Core or higher
  • Graphics: 1 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: "Fruit: Chain Effect" is a link-and-match game where you collect and combine fruits. Obtain fruit items by completing levels or through market drops every 2 hours. Fruits come in Legendary, Rare, High, and Common rarities, with limited drops to maintain balance.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
